Blog.post: The Story of an Hour is mainly about a woman whos husband dies. She finds out and she goes to her room and she starts thinking about her husband and how she is a single woman. She's finds out that she's a free woman and she doesn't have to answer to anyone any more. This short story has inspired me not to depend on any man and that it's o.k. to be alone and on your own. It tells me that maybe we're the strongest when, us ladies, don't have a man in our lives. I really enjoyed this short story and if you're going through "man problems", I would encourage you to read this story, The Story of an Hour, by Kate Chopin.

Hmm....hard thind to think about, what a father means to me? A father is a man who is always there to listen to your problems and care about what's going on in your life. He's a man that will say he loves you just because. My dad, even though we get in lots of arguments and we hardly ever see eye to eye, he's a good dad and I know he loves me. It's not about saying that you love someone it's about proving it, it's what you do that matters. My dad shows me that he loves me. When I need money he usually gives it to me, I never go hungry, I never don't have clothes on my back, he's a really good dad once I think about it. I love him and maybe I need to show it a bit more. A father doesn't have to be biological, so if there's a man in your life that does all these things, he's your dad, and it's time to prove that you love him.
